eggWeakness.title: Phosphate sensitivity
eggWeakness.description: Each Nemesis exposed to Fire extinguisher or Fire Control Center action, falls back and takes 1 damage

nemesisBodyWeakness.title: Vitality
nemesisBodyWeakness.description: Empty Attack roll again adult Nemesis' is treated as 1 damage

crewMemberBodyWeakness.title: Stress reaction
crewMemberBodyWeakness.description: During Surprise attack, Nemesis' Danger token value is reduced by 1 (to min. 1)
